text:
Which of the following includes only sections of the Global Investment
Performance Standards?
A. Disclosure, Public Equity, Presentation and Reporting.
B. Real Estate, Calculation methodology, Fundamentals of Compliance.
C. Input Data, Composite Construction, Wrap Feel Speculative Margin
Account (SMA) Portfolios.
For more questions related to this topic review, log in to your Schweser online account and
launch SchweserPro TM QBank; and for video instruction covering each LOS in this topic
review, log in to your Schweser online account and launch the OnDemand video lectures, if
you have purchased these products.
